presentation: Explore my featured projects, the skills I have acquired and the important achievements that reflect my commitment and passion for my profession.

about.title: About me
about.description1: Since I was a child, technology has been my passion. My first encounters with computers and fascination with how programs worked guided me towards computing.
about.description2: Over time, my interest grew and I began to explore
about.description3: He spent hours dismantling and assembling computers, understanding the purpose of each component.
about.description4: This passion led me to study
about.description5: at the Institute of {{0}}. I have worked on various projects, applying and expanding my knowledge. Each project is a new challenge and an opportunity to grow personally and professionally.
about.description6: I hope to continue developing my career, acquiring new skills and contributing my knowledge and experience.
about.span1: the architecture, technical details and hardware configuration.

servicesprofile.desingdescription: I specialize in designing intuitive and engaging software, from initial conception to final product. I use agile methods to quickly iterate and adjust the design based on user feedback, ensuring it meets high quality standards and their needs.
servicesprofile.developmentdescription: In development I ensure the robustness and scalability of the system. I collaborate closely with teams using methodologies to quickly adapt the product as it evolves, ensuring solutions that not only work well, but are also easy to maintain.
servicesprofile.maintenancedescription: In software maintenance, I guarantee efficient and problem-free systems. I detect and fix problems before they affect users, carefully deploying updates to maintain safe and continuous operation, adapting to new needs as they arise.

workprojects.time: Check the weather in any city with this application built with React and TypeScript. This project also used Zod for data validation and schema.
workprojects.recipify: Recipify is developed together with classmates for the programming subject. The website allows you to register, search for cooking recipes and publish recipes, it has integrated {{0}}, JWT, roles and verification.
workprojects.ecommerce: My first e-commerce has a filter by price and category, and has a shopping cart.
workprojects.financial: Organize the financial balance and generate a detailed record of expenses and income.
workprojects.tictactoe: Tic Tac Toe game developed with React, used in React Context Provider project for state management.
workprojects.crud: A CRUD that displays user details and integrates with a database.

skills.1: I have solid knowledge and experience in software development, excelling in creating innovative and efficient applications. My skills include programming in various languages ​​and problem solving.
skills.2: I am delighted to have the opportunity to discuss how my skills and experience can contribute to the success of your project.
skills.3: I am always looking to improve my skills and constantly adapt to new trends and technologies in the field.
